replies.body: Even though you didn't mean to leave, [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) will treat them all equally because it still causes others a negative experience.  It does suck that this resulted in a loss, so it's really important to resolve whatever is causing it.  If this is a common trend, let me know what's going on and I'll try to help!
it wasnt a loss i won that the game. but i lost lp and was put in low priotity queue is the point even though i won the game.
I hate to shed this bad news, being marked as a leaver counts as a loss and with it LP.
